Nashville, Tenn.
Sept. 20th. 1864.
To his Excellency
Governor Bramlett,
Sir.

I am informed that Col, Watts, and Surgeon Finley of the 2d K.Y. Cav'l, recommended myself to you for the position Asst. Surgeon in there Regiment. I would therefore respectfully ask if a commission for Said position has been forwarded from your office, and if so to whom was it Sent.

I have the honor to be very Respectfully
your obediant Servant.
S. J. Layman,
Act'g Ass't, Surg U. S. A.
Nashville, Tenn.
